content: @Henrik Böving shared the following link last week, I am copying it here because it is relevant to anyone interested in the new Lean code generator pipeline: https://v2.ocaml.org/manual/flambda.html
I also wrote a mail to one of the responsible people for this asking for further details/docs/papers, no response yet though
Another useful resource is Haskell's optimizer source code: https://github.com/ghc/ghc/tree/master/compiler/GHC/Core/Opt
